topic.title: 510.001 Policy.

body.p: Requiring activities and contracting officers shall use the results of market research to identify if there are existing tiered solutions (i.e., Tier 3, Tier 2, or Tier 1 solutions) that can meet the need prior to proceeding with establishing a Tier 0 solution (see subpart 507.71).
